original_text: When the man saw that he could not overpower him, he touched the socket of Jacob’s hip so that his hip was wrenched as he wrestled with the man.
korean_text: 자기가 야곱을 이기지 못함을 보고 그가 야곱의 허벅지 관절을 치매 야곱의 허벅지 관절이 그 사람과 씨름할 때에 어긋났더라

sentences.original_text: that he could not overpower him
sentences.korean_translation: 자신이 그를 이길 수 없다는 것을

sentences.original_text: he touched the socket of Jacob's hip
so that his hip was wrenched
as he wrestled with the man
